I encourage you all to look into villas! The villa only cost us a little more than Four Points wanted to charge us for a FOLD OUT BED!!!! With a bit of googling you can find yourself a beautiful villa for a lot less than this hotel is charging; especially if you have kiddos and you want a yard for them to have some space. I really hope that the hotel now focuses on customer service to customers in future who have been loyal to them. We wonâ€™t come back again after the hotel tried to charge us so much for a fold out bed in the room we already paid for. Kindest regards.

My 1st bad experience with this chain. Booked my room in advance, yet I didnâ€™t get the room I paid for. took almost 30 mins for them to direct me with the new room that was surprisingly still occupied with another guest. Had to wait almost 1 hour + 3 times complaining + 3 times going back and forth to the reception just to get a room that was below what I paid and expect for. Shameful reservation system.

THE LIGHT IN THE BATHROOM KEPT ON FLASHING! AND ALSO IF YOU GET A ROOM ON THE 6TH FLOOR THE WORKERS AT THE BAR BY THE 6TH FLOOR POOL ARE SO RUDE! THEY DONâ€™T EVEN LET YOU HAVE REFILLS ON YOUR DRINKS! AND THE FOOD AT THE BUFFET ON THE 1ST FLOOR ARE TRASH THE ONLY PART I LIKRD ABOUT THE FOOD IS THE FRUIT AND THE FRUIT SMOOTHIE! AND THE SCRAMBLED EGGS ARE SO WATERY! Lampu di kamar mandi terus berkedip! Dan juga jika Anda mendapatkan kamar di lantai 6, para pekerja di bar di lantai 6 kolam sangat kasar! Mereka bahkan tidak membiarkan Anda memiliki isi ulang minuman Anda! Dan makanan di prasmanan di lantai 1 adalah sampah satu-satunya bagian yang saya sukai tentang makanannya adalah buah dan smoothie buah! Dan telur orak-ariknya sangat encer!

The hotel is good unfortunately the room had a bad odour, the shower was leaking the toilet hose was leaking, we also had a bad experience at the restaurant when we ordered food and drinks it took an hour to deliver in spite of informing the staff that my daughter was hungry. The staff say they are sorry but diddnt di anything until we complained many times.Overall bad experience we wouldn't stay here again. Thank God it was just 3 nights in this hotel.
This hotel is not safe! Currently have a friend there they got their room broken into while at dinner. Obviously staff at hotel took all their money - cash in safe! Terrible and no help from hotel.

I made the mistake of ordering a medium rare rib eye last night .First of all was a way undercooked steak nothing to do with rib eye with a tiny salad on the side that lead to food poisoning. It looked like in a workers cantina the way was served in the plate. Waiters in the garden are some kids do yourself a favor and go main street Legian where are very good places this one is a joke and you risk food poisoning like me.

Hotel ini memiliki lokasi yang bagus. Namun, kamar-kamarnya sangat tua, dan suhu di kamar saya tidak terkendali, tiba-tiba menjadi panas atau dingin. Saya juga mempertanyakan profesionalisme staf, karena tidak ada yang membantu membawakan barang bawaan kami. Saat sarapan, manajer menyambut saya dengan hangat dan bertanya apakah saya menyukai kamarnya. Saya menyampaikan ketidakpuasan saya dan melaporkan masalahnya, dan manajer berjanji untuk mengatasinya. Namun, masalah tersebut tetap tidak terselesaikan hingga saya check-out. Saya tidak akan menginap di hotel ini lagi.

Saya ke sana tiga tahun lalu dan kembali lagi musim panas ini. Kualitas air kolam renangnya buruk, dan handuknya berbau seperti limbah. Saya tidak akan kembali, meskipun harganya murah. Sarapannya juga kurang. Stafnya ramah.

Kondisi kebersihannya paling buruk di antara semua hotel yang pernah saya kunjungi... Benarkah ada bedak tamu lain di toilet... Ini kan hotel... Dan tisunya bau apek, jadi saya penasaran ada apa sebenarnya. Lokasinya bagus untuk jalan kaki ke restoran seperti Crumb & Coaster/Goku/Black House Burger, tapi letaknya di gang, jadi kalau saya pesan Grab, terus-terusan batal... Saya ke Bali setiap tahun, tapi saya tidak mau menginap di sini lagi.

Hotel bintang 4 yang menjijikkan, jujur â€‹â€‹saja, foto-fotonya akan berbicara sendiri. Satu-satunya keuntungannya adalah lokasinya yang strategis dan tidak ada imbalan komersial yang diberikan kepada saya, namun saya meminta peningkatan kamar hanya untuk mendapatkan bak mandi untuk anak saya yang berusia 14 bulan. Saya diminta membayar 500,00 rupee per malam. Belum pernah terdengar. Saya membayar untuk peningkatan kamar ketika saya berada di Renaissance sebelumnya dan mereka meningkatkan kamar saya tanpa meminta apa pun, itulah mengapa saya tidak merekomendasikannya sama sekali. Lari!!!!!! Saya bahkan mempersingkat masa inap saya menjadi 2 malam, bukan 4 malam, dan serbuan semut di kamar, kita bicara tentang bintang 4, tidak dapat diterima, dan untuk penutupnya, keberangkatan, mereka meminta koper kami selama 30 menit untuk dibawakan kepada kami, tidak, itu tidak mungkin lagi, meskipun saya membatalkan 2 hari 2 malam menginap di hotel itu!!!!!!!!! Sayang sekali bukan 0, kalau tidak saya akan memberi nol
Semuanya buruk kecuali lokasinya. Makanan dan staf hotel sama-sama tidak profesional. Kamarnya sangat lembap. Air kolam renang juga disemprot setiap hari. Tidak direkomendasikan.

Panas. AC-nya sudah sangat tua dan tidak berfungsi dengan baik. Kalau kamu mudah kepanasan, saya tidak merekomendasikannya. Lokasinya di pusat kota, jadi kalau tujuanmu relaksasi, saya tidak merekomendasikannya. Harganya lumayan, tapi tidak buruk juga.

Jangan tertipu oleh nama atau lobinya. Kamarnya kecil, dan AC-nya mengeluarkan suara mesin cuci yang aneh, membuat Anda merasa seperti tidur dengan mesin cuci menyala sepanjang malam. Selimutnya lembap, dan lingkungannya buruk.
Enggak juga. Handuknya baunya aneh, dan baju renangku juga baunya aneh setelah main di kolam renang. Kayaknya aku nggak bakal balik lagi deh.
Makanannya sudah tua.

To be honest im expecting alot from this hotel because ive been staying in four point sheraton in different country. I compare this branch here in bali is a quite disappointing. First the room is quite outdated, no noise barrier in each room you can hear the conversation at the opposite room. Then for the security im quite hesistant, coz there is this one time after they clean our room they forgot to unlock the door guard. Then when we are about to enter the room we cannot go in. Then i called the reception, they sent maintainance personnel, the personnel just bump the door and its open already. So scary. And if you like near the beach i dont recommend this coz this hotel is super far from kuta beach. There is no straight way going to beach. But the staff is very accomodating and very helpful.

The room was fine other than screaming children next door and fireworks going off every single night. My main problem was that I signed up for $100 Kelingking beach tour and it wasnâ€™t AT ALL what it was advertised. They took me to the beach but we spent 20 minutes there and left. No time to actually go to the beach. We spent the LEAST amount of time at the one thing I signed up to do. They figured out after I signed up that I wasnâ€™t going to get what I wanted out of the tour and instead of telling me they gladly took my money anyway and let me spend 12 hours on the tour just to be disappointed. When I brought up the deceit and the false advertisement, management reached out and said sorry you flew 20 hours here and spent $100 just to be lied too. Here, take a free massage on us. Like that makes up for it at all. But they assured me that their staff would be re trained so they donâ€™t lie to guests in the future so that really helps me.

Even though the hotel staff was incredibly friendly and did all their best (I would give 5 stars for hospitality), our overall experience wasn't that great. Me and my partner stayed for 10 days here. We booked mostly for the pool right outside the door of the room, but got a higher room with view of the kiddy pool.. very bad location of room while other guests had a much nicer room and view. This was one of the lesser important points for us. More important was the fact that our personal belongings were moved every time the room was cleaned and a towel was taken. We did not really feel our privacy was respected this way. More importantly what shaped our negative experience is the terrible location of the hotel. When you step out, you step out in chaos (especially july-august). Extremely busy (traffic and scooters!!) and dirty streets all around the hotel, and a lot of criminality such as drugdealing, prostitution and pimps in the same street as the hotel. The neighbourhood is also very dirty with rats everywhere. The location is not something the hotel can do much about I guess, but it does influence the experience since we did not really have a relaxing vacation experience. Pool is more inside, not really a good outside pool and kuta beach is more for surfing and also dirty with rats. So you have to already drive +-45 min to get somewhere nice to swim. It's a good idea to do some research before booking this hotel. One incident occurred as well where we had to wait one hour for or coffee and we asked like 3 times (even though we are pretty patient people), still no coffee while we paid a lot for the whole stay and breakfast included.. Also an agression incident happened in another room during our stay which made us feel incredibly unsafe. We alerted security. But thank you to the staff of the hotel though, we valued the friendliness.

Room included breakfast and after eating a little bit of cold crusty food on the first day, I was sick so won't eat here. Cleaners walked into the room unannounced. The tiny balcony only has one chair. The other half of the balcony is glassed off. Waste of space. We needed a cut lunch and a water bag just to get to our room which was positioned in the kids area. No peace and quiet at all through the day, just screaming kids. Never again will I stay here.

Very disappointed in this hotel. Supposed to be family friendly, but pool is ice cold and so filthy I would not let my child swim it, and because of the temperature they did not even want to. Booked a stay of 9 nights, requested early checkout and refund for 8 nights as the standard is simply not good enough, but was refused refund. Avoid at all cost unless you are willing to accept ice cold pool and filthy water which is NOT appropriate for children.

I stayed at Four Points by Sheraton in Kuta for 5 days and 4 nights with my family, and this is my overall experience. Pros: - The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, which really enhanced our stay. They were always ready to assist with anything we needed. - The room had recently been revamped. - The family room was spacious, and the designated kids' area was a nice touch. It gives the little ones them their own space. - The hotel is in a great area, close to many cafes and restaurants, making it easy to grab a bite or enjoy the local scene. While it's a bit of a walk to the beach, it's not too far to make it inconvenient. Cons: - Unfortunately, the door to the room didnâ€™t close properly. We had to push it to get it to latch, and many guests seemed to slam it shut, which could be disruptive for light sleepers. - The soundproofing in the room wasnâ€™t great either. I was woken up several times by slamming doors and conversations from outside the room, which could be annoying if you're a light sleeper. - The kids' area in the family room, while cute, it is lacked of sufficient lighting, making it impossible to play there during night time. - The furniture in the kids' area was quite heavy, which caused a lot of noise when moved. - Comparing this hotel to other kids' clubs, unfortunately, this was the only one where my kids actually got injured. The way to the slide required kids to bend really low, and several times my kids hit their heads. The slide itself wasnâ€™t arranged in a way that felt completely safe, and the ball pit didnâ€™t have enough balls to cushion them properly when they landed, which led to some bruises. This was concerning for us as parents. Overall: The hotel need a lot of improvement! The kids' club area, in particular, could use some safety improvements. Additionally, some adjustments to room soundproofing, door quality, and lighting would go a long way. If you're a light sleeper or have young children, you might want to consider these factors when choosing a hotel.

Definitely have mixed feelings regarding this Hotel. On arrival staff , service is excellent. The rooms have the biggest comfortable king size bed I have ever had. We were placed next to the dinning area which even with so called sound proof glass was noisy especially in the early morning & when staff are cleaning. The hotel overall was high standard of cleaning & serviced rooms daily where fresh bottled water was supplied. The in house spa was value for money & the top floor pool & bar area was fantastic. The service was 10/10 from every single staff member who always greeted you with a smile & hello no matter what time of the day or night. The biggest disappointment was the food , breakfast was included in the package daily but we passed many mornings and went elsewhere. The buffet breakfast was always cold, food especially bacon over cooked & uneatable , the juice was concentrated syrup, the coffee well I wonâ€™t go into details how bad , then the rest of the buffets available at night even worseâ€¦hence we ate elsewhereâ€¦ Would probably never go back as too many negativesâ€¦

Hotel is dated, style is from the 80's, needs major renovation. Husband is also a Titanium Elite asked a few times for room upgrade, staff would state, we would provide when room becomes available. Hotel was empty during the entire stay, guest services never follow through with request. We wanted to stay at the other Sheraton in Kuta but it was completely sold out.

The room was booked a couple of months ago & full payment had already been made. We reported after 1500 on 22 Sep. We reported to the staff at reception, two ladies to be precise. The one who handled our case, politely told us that we had only booked the rooms & payment is yet to be made. We insisted that the payment had already been made. She verified the records for the previous months & finally confirmed what we said. She told us that a 15 min massage & b/f for three days are complimentary for each guest. When we reached the restaurant in the morning, the staff told us that we are not entitled for complimentary b/f!! We had to request her for a recheck. On rechecking, she agreed with what we said. We told the gentleman at the reception that we were going out for a tour & requested him to get the room cleaned up & left. We returned in the evening only to see that nothing had been done. A card was lying on the floor. The housekeeping staff had probably come & saw a red light indicating not to disturb. Probably the light was left on by us by mistake. However, we wish the reception staff had informed them accordingly since we had already requested for a room clean up. No one had verified again as to what had happened. Had there been a medical or any other emergency, what would have happened? When I went in the evening today after our return to the reception staff for a discussion, without even saying sorry, she tried to tell me that they did not do the job as the red light was on. She could not give a proper reply when I asked her as to what happened to what I had requested the morning staff about the room clean up. I had confirmed from her that all the staff understand English. There were lapses at multiple places that is not expected from your hotel.
The room is outdated. Too much empty space unused. The bathroom is OLD. Location: in the middle of kampung, inconvenient

Menginap ambil paket nyepi, breakfast antri terlau panjang kekurangan staff karena pake protokol kesehatan untuk mengambil makanan utama, tp untuk minum dan rotu ambil sendiri. Malam jam stgh 2 alarm bunyi menyuruh evakuasi ternyata alarm palsu, sudah gendong anak 2 ke lobby. setiap makan siang dan malam antre panjang bgt, makanan juga kurang ok kalo dibandingkan four point unggasan, kolam renang nya bagus hanya saja hotelnya penuh jadi seperti over capacity. Hal yang ok, staff sudah berusaha maximal. Hari yang berat untuk hotelier

Beware if you're staying here!! we stayed at four points by Sheraton for 3 nights, this is by far our favorite hotel in bali but We got robbed at this property. On Aug 20 we extended the time for checking out to 2pm and exactly at 2pm we left our 2 suitcases and 1 bag and 1 backpack at (baggage storage room) the guy took the luggage and give us the receipt. I left 300$ cash and passports inside the backpack. We got our luggage back around 3:20 pm after we arrived to the airport i realized that my backpack has been opened by someone and searched inside of it it wasn't like the way i left it (not organized) They Left everything but took the 300$ cash .

Hygine of shower is the worst. Did not use shower in the side toliet. There are things growing on it. Room is old. Desk is shaky. Only the bed is good. Food is the best in the place for order menu. Drinks isnt bad. Food and drinks are price greatly. Satay pig is the best in bali i had so far.

The hotel by itself is average, like any other 4 star hotel. The pool looks nice but not easily accessible to guests not living on the ground floor. The receptionists were nice and the staff is polite. We got to the hotel a few hours before check-in that is 1:30 PM where as the check in was at 3:00 PM and we finally got our room at 3:30 PM. The room was below average, the A.C didn't work, after we complained about the same, an engineer was sent to fix it. He tried for about 45 minutes which didn't really help and it was still hot. Couldn't sleep at all. Very disappointed.

The key card didn't work 3 times in one week we stayed at Four Points by Sheraton. They literally broke the door down to get into the room. The food was ridiculously over priced compared to neighboring hotels. The rooms were really small. Not much walking space. The hot water temperature was lukewarm and when we asked to increase the temperature, it was not possible. The bath water also was of high chlorine content. It felt like you had a shower with lukewarm pool water. The linen are old and worn out. Their recommendation for transport and tour guides were double the normal price. Bali is beautiful but Four Points by Sheraton at Kuta was a huge let down.

Very very disappointed on arrival, the pictures look so much better than in real life. No baths in rooms. Doors to room back onto loud busy street. People polite and friendly. Nice spa treatment, but just converted hotel rooms, nothing special. Food was very very average. Overall an ok stay, our 8th time in Bali tho and by far the worst.
Nice hotel but the rooms are small out dated badly designed. Breakfast very minimal selection so not too impressed. Compared to other 4 points this hotel need a full renovation and redesign.

In a very crowded place and took a long time to get here. Customer service is quite poor; I was assured I could check in early and told to wait in the lobby. Two hours later, the room â€œis still being prepared.â€

ItÂ´s supposed to be a four-star hotel itÂ´s not. Wifi did work bad, had connection sometimes and sometimes I was without for longer periods. Dogs barking outside the hotel and although I have earplugs on it waked me up. AC that hasnÂ´t been changed in a VERY long time and it works very bad and sounds loud. Very bad isolation between rooms. I pay money for a four-star hotel and I want basic things to work this was really not a good experience. Seriously itÂ´s 2018 and I even canÂ´t get a proper internet connection on a Sheraton hotel?

A 3 star hotel with very bad house keeping services n attitudes. I had to call four times to request even Nescafe n sugar sachets n had to wait for almost 30 mins n confronted the corceige attendant to get my items. Besides , the toilet stinks with ammonia smell n the floor was slippery. What a terrible experience!
They offer 150k/person day pass with access to kids pool and kids playground, but forget to tell you that the playground ia closed for 2 hours as the girl in there has to go for a meeting....

Don't go by the name, Bad bad hotel service I have come across in a long time. The room was not at all up to the mark. AC wasn't working properly, the bathroom door was not opening properly, tap was broken.
Handuknya sdh berubah warna menjadi abu2 & samping2nya robek. Jln dari lobby untuk mencapai kamar sangat jauh, hanya breakfastnya saja yg enak.
Staff fantastic . Rooms not 4star more like 3star , nowhere to hang clothes only if you come with one pair of shorts, tee shirt.
Certainly not a 4-star hotel. Broken down building + rooms, with poor amenities and sub-par Starwood / Marriott experience - from food to service.
Hotelnya bagus tapi parkirnya tiadk nyaman tidak ada yang mengatur.
Waduh... akses jalan masuk untuk sampai ke hotel, sepenuhnya adalah siksaan. Maaf, enggak lagi deh..
Tempat yg sulit dijangkau,staff yg slow response dan fasilitas yg kurang
Good place but utilities are so poor against the name by four points

Sarapannya bervariasi, tetapi hambar. Kamar-kamarnya agak usang dan benar-benar tidak menarik. Handuknya berwarna putih, tetapi sekarang abu-abu. Kamar selalu gelap karena jendelanya menghadap ke halaman hotel. Kami menginap dari tanggal 31 Desember hingga 1 Januari. Kami makan malam, yang juga mengecewakan. Namun, program hiburannya bagus.

Saya menelepon untuk mengeluh tentang kebisingan konstruksi, dan kebisingan itu berhenti sejenak, tetapi kemudian kebisingan itu muncul lagi. Saya diminta untuk pindah kamar. Mereka bilang sudah tenang, tetapi konstruksi mulai lagi di depan kamar saya. Saya penasaran apa yang dipikirkan staf di sini?

Kamarnya berbau tidak sedap, lembap, semuanya basah, seprai lembap, AC-nya selalu disetel ke 20 derajat Celcius, dingin sekali. Kalau dinaikkan ke pengaturan yang lebih tinggi, semuanya jadi lembap dan mengerikan. Sisi positifnya, pelayanannya ramah dan sarapannya lezat!

Masalah besarnya adalah banyak keluarga menginap di sini, tapi merokok diperbolehkan di tepi kolam renang. Handuknya bau. Mereka tidak membersihkan kamar saat dibutuhkan. Kenapa mereka bertanya apakah kami ingin dibersihkan saat kami masih di dalam kamar? Saya sudah menekan tombol bersih-bersih kamar dan pergi, tapi tiga jam kemudian, kamarnya masih belum dibersihkan. Meskipun kolam renang tutup pukul 22.00, beberapa orang masih mengobrol dan bermain sampai pukul 01.00 atau 03.00.

Fasilitasnya jauh lebih tua daripada dulu. Jauh lebih buruk daripada saat pertama kali dibuka. Handuk di hotel berbau, dan ada sandal dan botol air di kolam renang! Kualitas airnya buruk, dan makanannya biasa saja. Selain lokasinya, saya tidak akan merekomendasikan tempat ini.
Lokasinya dekat dengan pusat kota. Stafnya ramah, dan sarapannya lumayan. Sisanya mengecewakan. Kamarnya kotor dan berbau tidak sedap. Kamarnya terlalu kecil dan berisik.
Tempat tidur dan handuknya dalam kondisi buruk. Stafnya ramah, tetapi kamarnya kurang bersih.
Kondisi kamarnya buruk. Handuknya sudah usang. Ada bau apek yang menyengat. Stafnya ramah.
Para petugas keamanan malam sama sekali tidak peduli dengan masalah saya ketika ponsel saya dicuri. Mereka bahkan meninggalkan pos mereka dan kami harus mencari mereka setidaknya selama setengah jam.
Lokasi bagus, tapi kamar kecil dan jelek
Ruangannya terlalu lembab~

Not bad, rooms were modern enough. Bed more comfortable than other hotels. Pool noisy, food at hotel average for the money. Staff excellent. Hotel showing its age especially around the pool and due for some maintenance. It's average for the area. 15min walk to the beach.

Checking in to the room took some time, including 3 trips up and down in the (too) small lifts with keys that didn't work, then a man with a laptop was called, the battery in the door was replaced... The breakfast buffet is good, good coffee, plenty of choice, decent quality products. Staff are very hospitable and friendly. Dinner in the hotel was acceptable but not inspiring. There are lots of other places to eat nearby. The room: good strong aircon, comfortable bed and pillows, wifi worked well, lots of hot water. The room has bland decor and needs an update/refurb, the furniture is very tired and poor quality. The lighting could be better. The plumbing isn't the best and it needs a new shower. The balcony is very odd. Most of the space is actually in the room albeit behind the curtains and is designated for luggage storage. The actual outside space is very small, only big enough for one chair and table. Except for one night when the person in the room above decided to rearrange their room furniture in the very early hours, the room was quiet. The fitness room is too hot but for a hotel, is ok. There is one set of cables, one set of dumbells from 2kg to 22kg, one bench, 3 swiss balls, 2 treadmills, 1 bike, 1 cross trainer. There is a water dispenser and small towels, flannels really. Unless you have a ground floor room with direct pool access you will struggle to find anywhere to sit around the lower pool. The hotel has a spa, a kids' club and pool and another pool on an upper floor.

This place is not bad its just in abit of a weird location and always takes a 20-40min taxi drive to get to no matter where you are. The rooms are ok. The best thing about this hotel is its cleanliness and also the staff are very polite and their service is amazing. The pool is nice also

Iâ€™d like to take a moment to sincerely appreciate the incredible staff who made our stay truly memorable. Their courtesy and dedication went above and beyond, and it didnâ€™t go unnoticed. A special shoutout to Budi and Kasni, who took extra care to understand our preferences and ensure we enjoyed every meal tailored to our tastes. Thank you for making our experience exceptional!
Staff are friendly, everything was great about this hotel except the access to the hotel. Located in an alley with one way car traffic only.

The villa is located quite far inside, about 15 minutes from the beach. I wasnâ€™t a fan of the room layoutâ€”small balcony with just enough space for one chair. The bed was huge and very comfortable, probably the best part of the room, but the towels werenâ€™t as clean as I expected. The breakfast was decent, though the vegetarian options were a bit disappointing. I had lunch there once, but it wasnâ€™t great.

It's a three-star hotel masquerading as a four-star hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Location was not fantastic due to the cramps streets and endless traffic. But for the price and a small bit of inconvenience it's doable.

Honestly, Saya adalah member of Marriot Bhonvoy. Menurut Saya, hotel ini sulit diakses menggunakan Mobil karena Jalannya Sempit. Variasi makanan lumayan, namun beberapa kali menjumpai lalat yg tidak sedikit di area meja makan. Saran: letakan pengusir lalat atau lilin di meja makan. Terakhir Saya kesana, lift pengunjung hanya 1 yg bisa digunakan di area lobby. Lift cukup kecil kapasitasnya. Untuk orang yg memiliki Anxiety di Ruang Terbatas tidak ramah.
Very beautiful hotel and swimming pool, but the rooms are dated and not very clean

This is a nice property on a very narrow street (during peak hours, tough to get in and out of whence commuting by four wheeler) that has some rather grey-looking establishments (the massage, tatoo bar variety - not necessarily bad, but not necessarily for everyone). Going to Kuta beach takes you through several more narrow channels and you'll likely have to dodge two and four wheelers on the way. Expect the beach to be about 15 minutes away at a brisk walk. Location aside, the property folks are very polite (front desk can be hit and miss - some people are very sweet and some are a tad more brash than you'd expect) - the restaurant staff are brilliant and individuals like Niken and Rheina can make you feel very welcome. The gym is reasonably equipped and is open 24/7 but can get crowded if five people are inside. No towels are available inside, surprisingly, but there are a shower room and a bathroom attached (the latter could be cleaned better). Rooms are nice and clean but can be a bit of a tight fit. The luggage store section has no 'curtain cover' for visual privacy from the rooms opposite. The restaurants have good food, but are slim on vegetarian options. That said, a non vegetarian will enjoy the breakfast buffet, though their offerings are a little repetitive. The Vertigo restaurant upstairs has an a la carte menu for those who'd like to try other options.

We booked a hotel in Kuta with the tag 'managed by Sheraton.' In total, we booked 2 rooms for 4 nights. The rooms were comfortable and clean; we had no issues with them as they were very cozy. However, unfortunately, for two nights, there was loud noise from the floor above ours. I stayed on the 5th floor and had no idea what was happening on the 6th floor, but there were two nights of significant disturbance. Regarding the hotel's food, both breakfast and a dinner we had at the restaurant were rather ordinary. The offerings weren't special, and the fruits weren't fresh. The breakfast buffet was overcrowded, and the food was just average, not reflecting the standards expected from a Sheraton-managed property. The same applied to the dinner; the food for us was generally unappetizing. I even ordered Singapore Laksa and received Oxtail Soup, which was excessively salty. The most significant issue was the hotel's location, situated on a very narrow street. This was something I didn't realize beforehand. So, when we first arrived at the hotel, there was a car coming from the opposite direction, and it was quite stressful because the car couldn't pass through easily. It's a nightmare if you stay at this hotel with a rental car. My recommendation for staying here would be to avoid bringing a car.

Very happy with the service and food. Toilets in rooms a bit shoddy, no ventilation to rid smell. The towels looked sad. No stationary. TV only shows local stuff. Restaurant staff above expectations. Morning breakfast 7 star.food and service. Night buffet, embarrassing. Spoilt the whole experience. Happy to pay the money but when a buffet is advertised and you can choose 1 piece of prawn, 1 pieces of this an that and any amount t of vegetables, ...not on. I would suggest not to offer such a buffet, unless the Banquet manager is trained correctly on buffets and budgets.
Three points by Sheraton when the rooms are concerned, the breakfast buffet on the other hand was awesome and was grand

The hotel was very close to Kuta Beach and all the eateries and shopping. The room was spacious with a nice balcony. The only exception were a few ants on the table near the coffee machine and the bathroom. But if you don't have issues with ants, then this hotel is absolutely a great place to stay!

I wasn't very happy about my stay at Four points Sheraton. First off, the check in process was pretty long. They seem confused and had to take a picture of my online booking receipt when I was already in my room. Secondly, the room â€¦
Room is old . Not well maintaned. I book this hotel cause its name. Turns out the hotel Hard to find . Road closed . Many grab/ gojek refused my car order. â€¦

This had been my first stay at the 4 points in Kuta. At least at first glance the rooms are clean, but if you looked to close behind the curtain you will find a lot of dust and dirt. Especially on the top of the cabinets. The staff is â€¦

My room was very nice but the bathroom was very old. The fitness centre needs improvements for a hotel this size. The rooftop bar and pool on the 6th floor is what stands out at this hotel. There is even a day care center for kids! Overall, not a bad hotel!

Service overall is great. The staff -- all the way from the security, front-desk, housekeeping, bar, and restaurant make you feel extra special and at home. All 3-stars are for them. Overall, facilities and rooms are standard and expected. â€¦

Fasilitas hotel lumayan. Ttp ada satu staff/manager pakai kemeja abu2 cara ngomong/komunikasi sama tamu tdk sopan. Kami menginap selama 3 hari. Setiap melayani tamu pada saat makan di resto, ngomong tdk sopan, tdk beretika berkomunikasi dgn â€¦
